channel.title: ~~~ Grand Exchange Interface DL! ~~~ + Instructions ~~~
channel.description:
Finished in about 2 hours. Took me a long time to get the sprites all in and in the right spot, but I got most of them. The thin sidebars are a bit messed up, but you can fix that easily, I CBF. I might make the boxed one, like when you first click exchange. The buy one is easy, you just have to change a word from "sell", to "buy". First you will need to download 2 things: [url=http://uppit.com/v/5AMAEZSM]Click here to download the Grand Exchange Interface![/url] [b][url=http://uppit.com/v/UFE1CQHU]Click here to download Lin's RS2 Interface Maker![/url][/b] (Credits to him) Or [b][url=http://www.mediafire.com/?xknqk1ezzwk]Here[/url][/b] if it doesn't work. (Interface Maker) [url=http://uppit.com/v/EEK7EXPM] Download the sprites [/url] Here's a short and easy tutorial: Once you have downloaded the 2 things, go into your customsprites file, and add this: (ONLY ADD THIS IF YOU GET ERRORS ON LOADING THE INTERFACE/STARTUP!)
13=confirmoffer 14=backbutton 15=spitline 16=price 17=quantitypricperitem 18=topgrandexchange 19=1button 20=10button 21=100button 22=ALLbutton 23=...button 24=plusbutton 25=minusbutton 26=quantity 27=gesidebar 28=getopbar 29=priceperitem 30=splitline2 31=minprice 32=marketprice 33=maxprice 34=chooseanitemtoexchange 35=grandexchange 36=cornerline
I have provided instructions in the Sprites folder to add the sprites.. Scroll back up and download it if you haven't yet. Now just follow Lin's tutorial to convert it into your server. The tutorial is [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,381702.0.html]here [/url]. [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/r8h0g2.jpg[/img] I hope you use it :D

Nice lol.

And maximum,
You’ll have to do that server-sided, it’s pretty hard and I don’t know how. You’ll also have to change some sprites, etc…

This is just pretty much showing off the interface, and if anyone really wants it for some reason then they can dl to play around with it and stuff. I haven’t added this to my server.

item.title: ~~~ Grand Exchange Interface DL! ~~~ + Instructions ~~~
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

Finished in about 2 hours. Took me a long time to get the sprites all in and in the right spot, but I got most of them.
The thin sidebars are a bit messed up, but you can fix that easily, I CBF. I might make the boxed one, like when you first click exchange. The buy one is easy, you just have to change a word from “sell”, to “buy”.

First you will need to download 2 things:

Click here to download the Grand Exchange Interface!

Click here to download Lin’s RS2 Interface Maker! (Credits to him)
Or Here if it doesn’t work. (Interface Maker)

Download the sprites

Here’s a short and easy tutorial:

Once you have downloaded the 2 things, go into your customsprites file, and add this:

(ONLY ADD THIS IF YOU GET ERRORS ON LOADING THE INTERFACE/STARTUP!)

13=confirmoffer 14=backbutton 15=spitline 16=price 17=quantitypricperitem 18=topgrandexchange 19=1button 20=10button 21=100button 22=ALLbutton 23=...button 24=plusbutton 25=minusbutton 26=quantity 27=gesidebar 28=getopbar 29=priceperitem 30=splitline2 31=minprice 32=marketprice 33=maxprice 34=chooseanitemtoexchange 35=grandexchange 36=cornerline

I have provided instructions in the Sprites folder to add the sprites… Scroll back up and download it if you haven’t yet.

Now just follow Lin’s tutorial to convert it into your server. The tutorial is here .

I hope you use it

Read full topic
